trans-unit.source: Represents a control for viewing flow content in a fixed viewing mode that shows content one page at a time.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controlo para visualizar o conteúdo de fluxo no modo de visualização fixo que mostra a página conteúda cada vez.

trans-unit.source: FlowDocumentPageViewer allows only one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> as a child element.
trans-unit.target: FlowDocumentPageViewer permite que apenas um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>como um elemento subordinado.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>

trans-unit.source: FlowDocumentPageViewer shows content in page-at-a-time viewing mode.
trans-unit.target: FlowDocumentPageViewer mostra conteúdo no modo de visualização de página-em-a-time.

trans-unit.source: A similar control, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>, shows content in continuous scrolling mode.
trans-unit.target: Um controlo semelhante, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>, mostra o conteúdo no modo contínuo de deslocamento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Both FlowDocumentPageViewer and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> are fixed to a particular viewing mode.
trans-unit.target: Ambos os FlowDocumentPageViewer e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>sejam fixos para o modo de visualização específico.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> includes features that enable the user to dynamically choose between various viewing modes (as provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode> enumeration), at the cost of being poorer performing than FlowDocumentPageViewer or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>.
trans-unit.target: Por outro lado, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>inclui funcionalidades que permitem ao utilizador dinamicamente escolher entre vários modos de visualização (conforme fornecida pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode>enumeração), ao custo de que está a ser efetuar poorer que FlowDocumentPageViewer ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a FlowDocumentPageViewer control with its default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: A ilustração seguinte mostra um controlo FlowDocumentPageViewer com predefinido [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: FlowDocumentPageViewer](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-main.png "Screenshot: FlowDocumentPageViewer") - **Content Area** - The content area displays the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ![Captura de ecrã: FlowDocumentPageViewer](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-main.png "captura de ecrã: FlowDocumentPageViewer") - **área de conteúdo** -área de conteúdos apresenta o conteúdo do <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>especificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>

trans-unit.source: - **Toolbar** - The default toolbar is docked underneath the content area, and hosts controls for navigating pages, and changing the zoom level.
trans-unit.target: - **Barra de ferramentas** -barra de ferramentas predefinida está ancorada, por baixo da área de conteúdo e aloja os controlos para navegar páginas e alterar o nível de zoom.

trans-unit.source: - **Page Navigation Controls** - The page navigation controls include a button to jump to the next page (the down arrow) or previous page (the up arrow), as well as indicators for the current page number and total number of pages.
trans-unit.target: - **Controlos de navegação da página** -os controlos de navegação da página incluem um botão para ir para a página seguinte (na seta para baixo) ou a página anterior (na seta para cima), bem como de indicadores para o número da página atual e o número total de páginas.

trans-unit.source: - **Zoom Controls** - The zoom controls enable the user to increase or decrease the zoom level by clicking the plus or minus buttons, respectively.
trans-unit.target: - **Zoom controlos** -os controlos de zoom permitem que o utilizador aumentar ou diminuir o nível de zoom clicando o sinal de adição ou menos botões, respetivamente.

trans-unit.source: The zoom controls also include a slider for adjusting the zoom level.
trans-unit.target: Os controlos de zoom incluem também um controlo de deslize para ajustar o nível de zoom.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.Zoom%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.Zoom%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.Zoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: - **Search** - The user can use the Ctr+F keyboard shortcut or you can use <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Find%2A> to toggle a search textbox that is used to find strings within the content.
trans-unit.target: - **Pesquisa** - o utilizador pode utilizar o atalho do teclado Ctr + F ou pode utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Find%2A>para alternar uma caixa de texto de pesquisa que é utilizada para localizar cadeias no conteúdo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Find%2A> for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Find%2A>para obter mais informações.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*> level can be decreased.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*>nível pode ser diminuído.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.DecreaseZoom%2A> method decreases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the amount specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.DecreaseZoom%2A>diminuições do método a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>nível pela quantidade especificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.DecreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is subject to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MinZoom%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor desta propriedade está sujeita ao valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MinZoom%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MinZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*> level can be decreased; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*>nível pode ser menor; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom*>

trans-unit.source: If you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, you need this key in order to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Se derivar de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, precisa esta chave para definir o valor do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>, passing CanDecreaseZoomPropertyKey as the `key` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>, transmitir CanDecreaseZoomPropertyKey como o `key` parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*> level can be increased.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*>nível pode ser aumentado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.IncreaseZoom%2A> method increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the amount specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.IncreaseZoom%2A>método aumenta a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>nível pela quantidade especificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.IncreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is subject to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MaxZoom%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor desta propriedade está sujeita ao valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MaxZoom%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MaxZoom%2A>

trans-unit.target: Se derivar de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, precisa esta chave para definir o valor do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom*> routed command.
trans-unit.target: Executa o <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom*>encaminhados comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom*>

trans-unit.source: This method decreases the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este método diminui atual <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>nível, o valor especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a button to decrease the zoom.
trans-unit.target: Predefinição <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] inclui um botão para diminuir o zoom.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method has no effect if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A> property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método não tem qualquer efeito se a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A>propriedade devolve `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Toggles the **Find** dialog.
trans-unit.target: Mudanças de modo email o **localizar** diálogo.

trans-unit.source: By default, Ctrl+F provides a keyboard shortcut for toggling the **Find** dialog.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, Ctrl + F fornece um atalho de teclado para ativando ou desativando a **localizar** diálogo.

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows the **Find** dialog on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> with default UI.
trans-unit.target: A seguinte figura mostra o **localizar** diálogo num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>com predefinição da IU.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: Find Dialog of FlowDocumentPageViewer](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-find.png "Screenshot: Find Dialog of FlowDocumentPageViewer") The default **Find** dialog includes a field for entering search text, as well as buttons for **Find Next**, **Find Previous**, and **Options**.
trans-unit.target: ![Captura de ecrã: Localizar caixa de diálogo de FlowDocumentPageViewer](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-find.png "captura de ecrã: localizar caixa de diálogo de FlowDocumentPageViewer") a predefinição **localizar** diálogo inclui um campo para introduzir o texto de pesquisa, bem como botões para **Localizar seguinte**, **Localizar anterior**, e **opções**.

trans-unit.source: The following **Find** options are provided by default: - Match whole word only - Match case - Match diacritic - Match kashida - Match alef hamza
trans-unit.target: O seguinte **localizar** opções são fornecidas por predefinição: hamza do - correspondência todo word só - correspondência caso - Match diacritic - correspondência kashida - correspondência alef

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom*> routed command.
trans-unit.target: Executa o <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom*>encaminhados comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom*>

trans-unit.source: This method increases the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este método aumenta atual <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>nível, o valor especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a button to increase the zoom.
trans-unit.target: Predefinição <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] inclui um botão para aumentar o zoom.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method has no effect if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A> property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método não tem qualquer efeito se a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A>propriedade devolve `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref> displays selected text when the control does not have focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"> </xref> apresenta o texto seleccionado quando o controlo tem foco.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref> displays selected text when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref> does not have focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"> </xref> apresenta o texto seleccionado quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"> </xref> não tem o foco; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição registada é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o que podem influenciar o valor, consulte [precedência de valor de propriedade de dependência](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.IsInactiveSelectionHighlightEnabled*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.IsInactiveSelectionHighlightEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"> </xref> tem foco e o texto seleccionado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref> displays selected text when the text box does not have focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"> </xref> apresenta o texto seleccionado quando a caixa de texto não tem o foco; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: A predefinição registada é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.IsSelectionActive*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.IsSelectionActive*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum allowable <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*> level for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número máximo permitido <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*>nível para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a slider that can be used to adjust the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> level.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] inclui um controlo de deslize que pode ser utilizado para ajustar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>nível.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the upper-limit value for the slider.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade especifica o valor de limite superior para o controlo de deslize.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The maximum allowable zoom level for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref>, interpreted as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: O nível de zoom máximo de permitido para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"> </xref>, interpretado como uma percentagem.

trans-unit.source: The default is 200.0 (a maximum zoom of 200%).
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 200.0 (zoom máximo de 200%).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MaxZoom*> dependency property.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a slider that can be used to adjust the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> level.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] inclui um controlo de deslize que pode ser utilizado para ajustar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>nível.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the lower-limit value for the slider.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade especifica o valor de limite inferior para o controlo de deslize.

trans-unit.source: Called when a printing job has completed.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando uma tarefa de impressão foi concluída.

trans-unit.source: Gets the selected content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o conteúdo selecionado o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Selection is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: Seleção é apresentada no .NET Framework versão 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [versões e dependências](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The selected content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo selecionado o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush that highlights the selected text.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o Pincel realça o texto seleccionado.

trans-unit.source: You can specify the brush that highlights selected text in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> by setting the SelectionBrush and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A> properties..
trans-unit.target: Pode especificar o Pincel realça o texto seleccionado num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>definindo a SelectionBrush e as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A>Propriedades …</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>

trans-unit.source: A brush that highlights the selected text.
trans-unit.target: Pincel que realça o texto seleccionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the opacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush*>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a opacidade da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush*>

trans-unit.source: If you set the SelectionOpacity to 0, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush%2A> is transparent and is not visible.
trans-unit.target: Se definir o SelectionOpacity como 0, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>é transparente e não está visível.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the SelectionOpacity to 1.0 or greater, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush%2A> is opaque and the selected text is not visible.
trans-unit.target: Se definir o SelectionOpacity 1.0 ou superior, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>está selecionado e opaco texto não está visível.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>

trans-unit.source: The opacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush*>.
trans-unit.target: A opacidade da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush*>

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.4.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 0.4.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionOpacity*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionOpacity*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionOpacity*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current zoom level for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o zoom atual nível para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The zoom level is constrained by the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MinZoom%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MaxZoom%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O nível de zoom é limitado pelos valores de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MinZoom%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MaxZoom%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MaxZoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MinZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The current zoom level, interpreted as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: O nível de zoom atual, é interpretado como uma percentagem.

trans-unit.source: The default is 100.0 (a zoom level of 100%).
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 100,0 (um nível de zoom de 100%).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the zoom increment.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o incremento de zoom.

trans-unit.source: The zoom increment is the percentage by which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> level is increased or decreased when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A> commands are executed, respectively.
trans-unit.target: O incremento de zoom é a percentagem pela qual o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>nível é aumentado ou diminuído quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A>comandos são executados, respetivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The current zoom increment, interpreted as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: O incremento zoom atual, é interpretado como uma percentagem.

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.0 (zoom increments by 10%).
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 10.0 (zoom incrementos % 10).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
